casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2003-0019. State v. Cowan.

Portage App. No. 2001-P-0109, 2002-Ohio-7271. Discretionary appeal allowed on Proposition of Law No. I and cause consolidated with 2003-0469, State v. Cowan, Portage App. No. 2001-P-0109, 2002-Ohio-7271.

Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., concur but would allow all propositions of law. F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents.
